author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Need some automation to install modules from the gallery, test against latest PSCore6 and see if they are tagged correctly for compatibility with coreclr as well as non-Windows.

Look for Add-Type usage, .Net API calls in scripts, assemblies installed in GAC

Talk to dotnet team on using existing static analysis tools for binaries

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: PSGallery needs better support to identify modules compatible with the user's environment (PS5.1 vs PSC6, Windows/Linux/MacOS) before we spend time on this

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This issue doesn't belong here, will work with PSGallery team to see if they have plans for this type of validation

title: Validate PSGallery Modules compatibility on .Net Std 2.0
